location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage and a couple of holes in the vecto side of the folio have obscured some of the body of the letter, making some of the text difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a refusal by the Resident at Bussora [Basra] to fulfill the Resident at Bushire's request for a cruizer and his refusal to accept private trading vessels as an alternative.
